Definition: In this task, you are given a public comment from an online platform. Your task is to classify the comment as either toxic or non-toxic. Toxicity is defined as anything that is rude, disrespectful, or unreasonable that would make someone want to leave a conversation.

This is a non-toxic comment because it is not rude or desrespectful.

Negative Examples.input: Comment: "racism" -appears to be the only card in your deck!?
